adverse_reactions: ADVERSE REACTIONS: Allergic sensitization has been reported following both oral and parenteral administration of folic acid.
contraindications: CONTRAINDICATIONS: FeRivaFA ™ is contraindicated in patients with a known hypersensitivity to any of the ingredients. Hemochromatosis and hemosiderosis are contraindicated to iron therapy.
dosage_administration: DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION: One capsule daily with or without food or as prescribed by your healthcare provider.
indications: INDICATIONS: FeRivaFA ™ is a multivitamin/multimineral dietary supplement indicated for use in improving the nutritional status of patients with iron deficiency.
